sentence: +4 View gallery Englishman Ian Poulter (above) has work to do if he is to make it to this year’s Masters With only one player from each group progressing to the weekend knockout stages, Poulter has to get past American Scottie Scheffler, twice a winner this year, and two of his Ryder Cup comrades in Tommy Fleetwood and Matt Fitzpatrick.
author: Derek Lawrenson for the Daily Mail
title: Ian Poulter is praying for one more match play miracle to qualify for his 17th Masters next month... with the Englishman needing to jump 17 places in the world rankings into the top 50

sentence: +3 View gallery Ian Poulter needed a huge week but suffered a comprehensive defeat by Matt Fitzpatrick +3 View gallery Fitzpatrick's game is well suited to the Match Play format and he played superbly Having lost on the opening day to American Scottie Scheffler, it means the only way Poulter can now make it to Augusta is by winning the Valero Texas Open next week.
author: Derek Lawrenson for the Daily Mail
title: Could Tiger Woods pull off a miracle and still play at the Masters? American great's name remains listed on the tournament website with less than two weeks until the tournament starts

sentence: Poulter’s chances were already slim after an opening loss at Austin Country Club and a 4 and 2 defeat to Ryder Cup team-mate Matt Fitzpatrick confirmed that he will miss the Masters for just the third time since his debut in 2004.
author: Phil Casey
title: Seamus Power set for Masters debut but misery for Ian Poulter and Paul Casey
